channel.title: CVE Feed for Go standard library -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go standard library -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-24790|2024-06-05T15:13:50.527Z -- go%20standard%20library -- net%2Fnetip
item.description: The various Is methods (IsPrivate, IsLoopback, etc) did not work as expected for IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses, returning false for addresses which would return true in their traditional IPv4 forms.

item.title: CVE-2024-24788|2024-05-09T20:25:03.081Z -- go%20standard%20library -- net
item.description: A malformed DNS message in response to a query can cause the Lookup functions to get stuck in an infinite loop.
